# Overview
*[Exerpt from New Frontiers vol. 7, "The Nauvis Effect", chap. 11, "On Foliage."]*
As a distant planet, Nauvis is naturally shrouded in mystery and wonder. From preliminary satellite reports, its lush forests are a sight to behold with towering trees that reach for the sky, vast oceans, and windswept desert dunes. But what make Nauvis truly unique are the trees; imbued with a mystical energy, they appear to sense the presence of sentient foreign beings. When approached, the trees glow with a radiant bioluminescence, illuminating the forest with a serene aura. It is suspected that other planets in the Nauvian region host similar natural phenomena, and further investigations are currently ongoing.

--------------
# Features

- Adds a glowing aura to the trees, and bioluminescence to the leaves and decorative foliage.

- Bioluminescence of tree leaves and decoratives can be controlled with startup mod settings.

- Default glow aura strength, scale, and color mode can be controlled with map mod settings.

- Also includes per-player mod settings for individualized control (by default these sync to map mod settings).

- Players can see the glow auras near all other players who share the same mod setting values for scale, color, and strength.

- Designed to have no noticeable impact on FPS/UPS for maps of any size, with any number of trees.

---------------------

# Compatibility
There are currently no known mod compatibility issues. To report a compatibility issue, please make a post on the discussion page.
